coded_answer.p: I am writing with reference to Over the Rainbow, the musical show, which I went to see at the Circle Theatre last night. Being a theatre lover, I am always looking forward to seeing new musicals, but unfortunately, this particular one was very disappointing.

First of all, Danny Brook was not starring, even though it was stated in your advertisement that he would perform, but the main role was played by an unknown actor. Secondly, I had to wait for forty fiveforty-five minutes for the show to start, and it was 20:15 (not 19:30) when the curtain went up.

Another disappointing thing was that I could not get anya student discount, even thatthough your advertisement promised them. To make things even worse, the theatre restaurant was closed after the show, because of the roof repairs.

As you can see I had a very disappointing evening - the worst one duringof my week's holiday in London. I would like therefore to have my money back, so please send me a cheque for Â£20 to pay the address above.
